mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JDBC_BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NO),0)+1 FROM JDBC_BOARD) , #{Title}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE JDBC_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{title}, BOARD_WRITER = #{writer}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{content}, BOARD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, B.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO no, BOARD_DATE "date", BOARD_WRITER writer, BOARD_TITLE title, BOARD_CONTENT content FROM JDBC_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_DATE) B) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{prePage} AND #{nextPage}

SELECT BOARD_NO no, BOARD_DATE "date", BOARD_WRITER writer, BOARD_TITLE title, BOARD_CONTENT content FROM JDBC_BOARD
and BOARD_WRITER LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%'
and BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
and BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_NO no, BOARD_DATE "date", BOARD_WRITER writer, BOARD_TITLE title, BOARD_CONTENT content FROM JDBC_BOARD
and BOARD_DATE LIKE TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
